text: Guizbangɨra, arazir pumuning ko mɨkezim zurara ikɨvɨra ikiam. Dar kara: nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itim ko, bizir aghuir e iniamiba bagha mɨzuair arazim ko, igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim. Ezɨ arazir mam, arazir igharazibagh afiragha bar faraghavɨra iti. Kar, igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim.
